body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! Thank you for contacting Rivera Solutions, your trusted security provider. My name is Justin Rivera. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hello Justin, my name is Emily Phillips.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Emily! In order to better assist you, could you please provide me with the make and model of your vehicle?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, I drive a red Honda Civic.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great choice! I also need to know how many people have access to your car keys. Could you please spell out the number of key holders for me?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: There are five individuals who have access to my car keys.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for sharing that information, Emily. It's important for us to ensure your security. Is there anything specific you're concerned about regarding your vehicle's security?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I feel happy with my car's security measures so far, but I want to learn more about additional options for enhancing its safety features.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm glad to hear that you're satisfied with your current security setup. We can definitely discuss further enhancements. Thank you for your time, Emily. Feel free to reach out if you have any more questions.
